snippet.title: Risk of Rain 2: PS5 and Xbox Series X Official Reveal!
snippet.description:
All new and existing players will be upgraded so pick it up today! 

PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP0292-CUSA16153_00-RISKOFRAIN2SIEA0 

Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/risk-of-rain-2/9P6F6TBGGVK3 

Alongside the Seekers of the Storm expansion, we’re making our official debut on Xbox Series X and PlayStation 5! 

For a long time now, folks have been able to play the existing PlayStation 4 and Xbox One versions on their next gen consoles. But now they’ll have the real deal. All new and existing players will be upgraded for free! And that upgrade isn’t just a sprinkling of performance optimization—oh no—it brings split-screen couch co-op and a handful of fun, platform-specific features. 

Here’s a sneak peek at the features coming with this upgrade: 
 
Both Platforms: 
- Split-Screen Local Multiplayer  
- 4k Resolution  
- 60 FPS 

PS5: 
- Activities 
- Progressive Trophies 
- DualSense Light Bar color mapping 
- DualSense Controller Sounds 

XBX/S: 
- Progressive Achievements 


Follow Gearbox on Social Media!

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/gearboxofficial
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gearboxofficial
Instagram: https://www.Instagram.com/Gearbox
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/GearboxOfficial
Website: https://www.gearboxsoftware.com
Gearbox Store: https://www.gearboxloot.com
